title: Competition: Pony Pony Run Run, Delphic, The Naked and Famous
body:
[![](http://admin.crackintheroad.com/wp-content/uploads/2011/03/normal_pony-pony-run-run-01-650x365.jpg)](http://admin.crackintheroad.com/music/6026-competition-pony-pony-run-run-delphic-the-naked-and-famous/attachment/normal_pony-pony-run-run-01)

Next week, on Tuesday 5th April, Spotify are hosting their first ever live streamed gig from the **KOKO** in London, and we’ve got a pair of tickets to give away. To see French arena-fillers **Pony Pony Run Run** (supported by **Delphic** and **The Naked and Famous** and complete with a DJ set from **La Roux**), simply “Like” us on our [Facebook page](http://www.facebook.com/crackintheroad) and write on our wall, telling us what your favourite track by any of those bands is.

The winner will be announced on Saturday 2nd April.

 [Hey You](http://soundcloud.com/pony-pony-run-run/hey-you) by [Pony Pony Run Run](http://soundcloud.com/pony-pony-run-run)
